data.title: Kirarin Revolution Song Selection Vol. 3 [Regular Edition]
data.meta_description:
[List of songs]
(1) Chance! (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (2) Ramatara (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (3) Olala (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (4) アナタボシ (MilkyWay) (5) San San GOGO (MilkyWay) (6) Chance! (Original Karaoke) (7) Ramatara (Original Karaoke) (8) Olala (Original Karaoke) (9) アナタボシ (Original Karaoke) (10) San San GOGO (Original Karaoke)
[Label]
Zetima
[Number of pieces]
1 piece
[CD Audition comment]
The third piece of theme song and ending collection of Anime 『 Kirarin ☆ Revolving 』.
Not only Tsukishima Kirari (Koharu Kusumi), but also the unit MilkyWay in the drama is synchronized with the real world of idol. There is the "passion" of idol songs.
[CD New Score Comment]
The third song selection of 『 Kirarin Revolution 』 which is popular in comics and anime.
[CD New Score Comment]
In addition to the song of the Morning Musume Koharu Kusumi who plays the animation version of Kirari, it also includes the number of Sayaka Kitahara, the unit with You Kikkawa, and MilkyWay which are active in Halloween pro-egg.
[Tie-up information]
TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 opening theme. 「 chance!
TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 ending theme. Ramatara 」
TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 opening theme. Ramatara
TV Kirarin Revolution 」 ending theme. 「 アナタボシ 」
TV 「 Kirarin Revolution Kirarin Starlight Tambourine "Image Song, アナタボシ
San San 」 「 「 」 「 」 「 」 「 」 Tetsuro Oda
data.text:
Product description ※Please note that product information is not in full comprehensive meaning because of the machine translation.

[List of songs]

(1) Chance! (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (2) Ramatara (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (3) Olala (Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume)) (4) アナタボシ (MilkyWay) (5) San San GOGO (MilkyWay) (6) Chance! (Original Karaoke) (7) Ramatara (Original Karaoke) (8) Olala (Original Karaoke) (9) アナタボシ (Original Karaoke) (10) San San GOGO (Original Karaoke)

[Label]

Zetima

[Number of pieces]

1 piece

[CD Audition comment]

The third piece of theme song and ending collection of Anime 『 Kirarin ☆ Revolving 』.

Not only Tsukishima Kirari (Koharu Kusumi), but also the unit MilkyWay in the drama is synchronized with the real world of idol. There is the "passion" of idol songs.

[CD New Score Comment]

The third song selection of 『 Kirarin Revolution 』 which is popular in comics and anime.

[CD New Score Comment]

In addition to the song of the Morning Musume Koharu Kusumi who plays the animation version of Kirari, it also includes the number of Sayaka Kitahara, the unit with You Kikkawa, and MilkyWay which are active in Halloween pro-egg.

[Tie-up information]

TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 opening theme. 「 chance!

TV 「 Kirarin Revolution 」 ending theme. Ramatara 」
